sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header>
      <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title>Map</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>
    <ion-content :fullscreen="true">
      <ion-header collapse="condense">
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-title size="large">Tab 2</ion-title>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>
      
      <!-- ---------- -->
              <l-map :zoom="13" :center="[50.9223,11.5723]" :options="{zoomControl: false}">
                <l-tile-layer style="z-index: 100" url="https://tiles.stadiamaps.com/tiles/alidade_smooth_dark/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png"></l-tile-layer>
                <!-- http://{s}.tile.osm.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png -->
                <!-- https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/ -->
                  <l-marker :lat-lng="markerLatLng" ></l-marker>
                  
                    <l-marker
                      v-for="(marker, index) in markers"
                      :key="index"
                      ref="markersRef"
                      :lat-lng="marker">
                    </l-marker>

              </l-map>
      <!-- ----------- -->
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';
import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent } from '@ionic/vue';
// import ExploreContainer from '@/components/ExploreContainer.vue';
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css"
import { LMap, LTileLayer, LMarker } from "@vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet";
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Tab2Page',
  components: { 
    IonHeader, 
    IonToolbar, 
    IonTitle, 
    IonContent, 
    IonPage, 
    LMap,
    LTileLayer,
    LMarker,
    },
  setup () {
    const supabaseUrl = 'https://fxcebsajvdlnwpmmodab.supabase.co'
    const supabaseKey = process.env.SUPABASE_KEY
    const supabase = createClient(supabaseUrl, supabaseKey)
  },
  async created() {
    const {data: events} = await this.$supabase
      .from('events')
      .select('coordinates')
    this.populate_markers_array(events)
    this.loaded = true
    // console.log(this.markers1);
    // this.cut = this.markers1.replace("", "");
  },
  data: () => ({
    spot: false,
    zoomControl: false,
    loaded: true,
    markers_works: [
        [48.864716, 2.349014],
        [51.509865, -0.118092]
    ],    
    markers: [],
    markerLatLng: [47.313220, -1.319482]
  }),
  methods: {
    populate_markers_array: function (marker_objects) {
      let markersArr = []
      marker_objects.forEach(element => {
        let coordsArr = element.coordinates.split(',')
        markersArr.push([parseFloat(coordsArr[0]), parseFloat(coordsArr[1])])
      });
      this.markers = markersArr
    }
  }
});
</script>

<style>
</style>
